scripts.clean: npm run cleanSDKConfig && cd .. && pio run -t clean
scripts.upload: npm run cleanSDKConfig && cd .. && pio run -t upload
scripts.upload:monitor: clear && npm run upload && npm run monitor
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run uploadfs && npm run upload
scripts.deploy:monitor: clear && npm run deploy && npm run monitor
scripts.clean:deploy: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run uploadfs && npm run upload
scripts.clean:upload: npm run clean && npm run upload
scripts.flash:upload: npm run flash && npm run upload
scripts.flash:monitor: npm run flash && npm run upload && npm run monitor
scripts.secure:status: cd .. && espefuse --port /dev/cu.usbmodem101 summary || echo 'Secure boot enabled (cannot read eFuse)'
